page.title: 03THE CHURCH
page.content: On Monday we went to the church and the vicar told us that the church was 7OO years old and after they built it there were little bits added on. We went up into the tower. We saw where the bell ringers ring the bells and we saw the bells. We could go right up to the top of the tower but some people did not go up. We saw the Lady Chapel and you can fit about 30 in the seats and 700 in the church. When it was eleven o'clock we were up in the tower when the clock struck the hour. We saw a very old chest but in french it is called a banc and there are three locks. Nobody could steal anything because three people have got one key each and one person could not open it without the other people knowing.
